title: Information Literacy-Centered Language Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language knowledge and experience in writing work reports
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen workplace professionals' ability to systematically analyze task-relevant information and apply it to linguistic expression

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze work-related language materials using information-based learning strategies
Learners can identify and explain core differences in linguistic concepts by applying variation theory
Learners create language artifacts that creatively utilize information through project-based assessment tasks
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
